name: Desperate Housewives: The Game
description:
JOIN THE DESPERATE HOUSEWIVES in a dramatic new prequel to the hit TV show! Your favorite characters are ready to welcome you as a new resident of Wisteria Lane. It’s time to build friendships and unravel mysteries in these brand new episodes.

MYSTERY AND DRAMA await! It’s up to you to solve a murder case. Choose your path as you explore the dark secrets of Wisteria Lane - find clues, gather gossip and unravel lies!

BUILD YOUR REPUTATION! Create your own story in the idyllic world of wealthy suburbia. Decorate your house, expand your wardrobe, collect luxury items, customize your look and make an impression that lasts! Win the housewives hearts, rise to fame and be the hottest star in the exclusive neighborhood of Wisteria Lane.

FLIRT YOUR WAY TO LOVE! Romance abounds, you never know whose eye you might catch on the sunny streets of Fairview.

If you love watching Netflix or HBO movies, then you should definitely check out Desperate Housewives: The Game.

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/dhthegame
instagram.com/DH_TheGame
pinterest.com/dhthegame
twitter @DH_TheGame

---

Desperate Housewives: The Game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money to save time or to purchase extra items.
